text: I will need to see more of Pokemon Let's Go to form a real opinion, but so far it looks like it has potential. I do feel like no online is a bummer and that this might be a bit too late in terms of riding on Pokemon GO's popularity, which has vastly shrinked. And now that we know more about it, there is no way they can think this is a true core Pokemon game like they've been telling us. Still, I'm glad to see more Pokemon experiments like this. Pokemon Quest is another one and I'm sure it will be very popular once it releases on Mobile. Soundtrack is ace!
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky The no online was misinformation reported by a journalist. The initial leak mentioned online, too
author: WallStaple

text: Also, the "core" game is coming the second half of 2019.

text: SupraDarky Yeah they announced the core game will release in 2019. To me, Let's Go is to get people who mostly just play Pokemon Go to get interested into the core games slowly.
